Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Reserving a table at a restaurant', 'Bank balance checking' and 'Filing a bank fraud report' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also play up to three rounds of trivia with the assistant.  [instruction 1 of 9]

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Sarah Brown
- Your bank account: 84318931431, with PIN 3941
- Today is Wednesday the 31st of June, 10 am

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Checking bank balance
- Filing a bank fraud report
- Reserving a table at a restaurant (e.g. The Porch or Tamarind) for today
- A game of trivia
